text: Linda Nellene Coffee (born December 25, 1942) : profile of Coffee is an American attorney and pro-choice activist. She is from Dallas, Texas. Coffee argued Roe v. Wade before the United States Supreme Court along with Sarah Weddington . : review of A Question of Choice by Sarah Weddington She argued for abortion and why it should be legal in the United States. Coffee was a member of the Women's Equity Action League. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American political activists Category:Lawyers from Dallas Category:American feminists
title: Linda Coffee
